Notes: Direct mapping: Latitude in decimal degrees
Direct mapping: Longitude in decimal degrees
Direct mapping: 0 - GNSS OFF 1 – GNSS ON with fix 2 - GNSS ON without fix 3 - GNSS sleep 4 - GNSS ON with fix, invalid data
Direct mapping: Number of satellites in fix
Prioritized mapping: Horizontal Dilution of Precision
Prioritized mapping: Position Dilution of Precision
Calculated field: Cardinal direction (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW)

Computation Approach: Use external API (Google) to convert latitude and longitude into geocoded address.
Notes: Calculated field: Single string representation of the location

Calculated field: Unix Epoch timestamp (milliseconds, number) when location/heading last changed significantly (threshold applied to filter GPS noise). Used for dwell-time calculations and "parked since X" features.
